subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher won the World Cup slalom in Alta Badia, Italy, reviving Austria’s chances of its first overall World Cup title, for men or women, in five years.
snippet: Marcel Hirscher won the World Cup slalom in Alta Badia, Italy, reviving Austria’s chances of its first overall World Cup title, for men or women, in five years.
